org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest

Interface PolicyStore


  • public interface PolicyStore
    Interface used to decouple the resource from storage of entitlements policies (privileges). Provides basic CRUDQ operations for policies.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Privilege create(Privilege policy)
      Creates the given policy in the underlying store.
      void delete(String policyName)
      Deletes the given policy from the policy store.
      List<Privilege> query(org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest request)
      Queries the store for a set of policies that match the given query.
      Privilege read(String policyName)
      Reads the given named policy from the policy store.
      Privilege update(String existingName, Privilege policy)
      Updates the given policy to match the new definition.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        Privilege create(Privilege policy)
          throws EntitlementException
        Creates the given policy in the underlying store.
        Parameters:
        policy - the policy to create. Must have a valid name.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if a policy with the same name already exists or if an error occurs creating the policy.

      • read

        Privilege read(String policyName)
        throws EntitlementException
        Reads the given named policy from the policy store.
        Parameters:
        policyName - the name of the policy to read.
        Returns:
        the policy.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if the policy does not exist or an error occurs.

      • update

        Privilege update(String existingName,
                 Privilege policy)
          throws EntitlementException
        Updates the given policy to match the new definition.
        Parameters:
        existingName - the existing policy name
        policy - the policy to update.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if an error occurs or the policy does not exist.

      • delete

        void delete(String policyName)
     throws EntitlementException
        Deletes the given policy from the policy store.
        Parameters:
        policyName - the name of the policy to delete.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if an error occurs or the policy does not exist.

      • query

        List<Privilege> query(org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryRequest request)
               throws EntitlementException
        Queries the store for a set of policies that match the given query.
        Parameters:
        request - the query request.
        Returns:
        the query results.
        Throws:
        EntitlementException - if an error occurs or the query is invalid.
